data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will continue to affect southern China in the next few days. The weather will be generally fine over the region tomorrow. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large. A broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the coast of Guangdong and the northern part of the South China Sea in the latter part of this week. With the band of clouds thinning out, the weather will improve and it will be warm during the day over the region during the weekend. Replenishments of the northeast monsoon are expected to bring dry and slightly cooler weather to Guangdong early to midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251217","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
